amendment.description: To increase funds made available for assessments of critical reservoirs and dams in the State of Hawaii.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3673 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 109.

action.text: Amendment SA 3673 proposed by Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S3966-3967; text: CR S3966) To increase funds made available for assessments of critical reservoirs and dams in the State of Hawaii.
